name: Archmage Spotty
description:
This is an adventure game made for the Blackthornprod GAME JAM #3.

You are an Archmage called Spotty who has been trapped in a mind prison. The demonic lord who has trapped you, is trying to obtain your secret formula for powerful elixirs. 

In order to win the game, you have to find and defeat the demonic lord before the timer runs out. 

You do not have many casts for your spell but it is incredibly powerful when it hits. It can not only save you from the enemy's shots but also defeat your opponents in one hit!

You can also make potions throughout the game by sacrificing your time or your crystals!

*Known bug: When you hit play button, the game seems to be paused. Just press Escape (pause button) twice and it will work!*
